title: Ben Carson Thinks the Earth Would Have Exploded During Big Bang
subtitle: While Carson does not buy into the theory of the Big Bang origin of our cosmos, a viral meme misrepresents Carson’s view on the topic.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Ben Carson once said “if the Big Bang is merely a theory, if by chance it was true, how would you explain that the Earth didn't blow up during the explosion?”
